CommunityShortDescription: The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF) brings together open-source, accessible applications, techniques, libraries, and tools developed by MITRE and the community to streamline security automation for Systems and in DevOps pipelines.
CommunityLongDec: The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF) brings together open-source, accessible applications, techniques, libraries, and tools developed by MITRE and the community to streamline security automation for Systems and in DevOps pipelines.
AboutGDGProgram: The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF) brings together open-source, accessible applications, techniques, libraries, and tools developed by MITRE and the community to streamline security automation for Systems and in DevOps pipelines

WhatWeDoTech.name: Heimdall Lite
WhatWeDoTech.desc: Heimdall Lite 2.0 is a JavaScript based security results viewer and review tool supporting multiple security results formats, such as: InSpec, SonarQube, OWASP-Zap and Fortify which you can load locally, from S3 and other data sources

WhatWeDoTech.name: Heimdall Server
WhatWeDoTech.desc: A Security Results Viewer for the web with storage, teams and history

WhatWeDoTech.name: InSpec_Tools
WhatWeDoTech.desc: A set of Ruby utilities and gem for creating, converting and processing security baseline formats, results and data

WhatWeDoTech.name: Heimdall_Tools
WhatWeDoTech.desc: A set of Ruby utilities and gem for converting and working with compliance data for viewing in the Heimdall applications

WhatWeDoTech.name: InSpecJS
WhatWeDoTech.desc: A Typescript Library for working with InSpec data

WhatWeDoTech.name: HeimdallJS_Tools
WhatWeDoTech.desc: A set of JavaScript utilities and gem for converting and working with compliance data for viewing in the Heimdall applications

WhatWeDoTech.name: InSpecJS_Tools
WhatWeDoTech.desc: A set of JavaScript utilities and gem for creating, converting and processing security baseline formats, results and data

WhatWeDoTech.name: Vulcan
WhatWeDoTech.desc: Application to help streamline the development of InSpec Profiles and Overlays from SRG guidance or InSpec Profiles

CommunityGuideline.name: Be nice
CommunityGuideline.des: We're all part of the same community, so be friendly, welcoming, and generally a nice person. Be someone that other people want to be around.
